articles.description: A C.D.C. panel recommended Covid shots for 5- to 11-year-olds, which could begin in days. The Biden administration has enlisted 20,000 health workers and shipped 15 million doses ahead of the decision.
articles.content:
The Navajo Nation managed to tame Covid-19 earlier this year, mounting a campaign that drove its vaccination rate far above the United States average, after the virus ravaged the Navajo people.
But … [+27090 chars]

articles.author: Scott Nover
articles.title: Facebook's facial recognition program is shutting down - Quartz
articles.description: The company is deleting more than 1 billion faces from its databases
articles.content: Facebook announced on Tuesday (Nov. 2) that it is shutting down its facial recognition software program. The company has been using the technology for a decademuch to the concern of privacy advocates… [+3270 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Hess
articles.title: The Mark Zuckerberg Aesthetic - The New York Times
articles.description: With his plans for a virtual reality metaverse, the Facebook founder pitches himself as a cultural impresario of the internet’s future.
articles.content: In recent months, Zuckerbergs Instagram feed has grown sleekly professionalized. He appears as a sportsman practiced in elite hobbies: foiling, fencing, rowing, spear throwing. In an Instagram video … [+3652 chars]
